settings_values.login_required_message: Please login before adding item to Wishlist
settings_values.could_not_add_to_wishlist_error_descript:
Something went wrong.
{product_name} was not added to wishlist. Please refresh page and try again.
settings_values.could_not_remove_from_wishlist_error_des:
Something went wrong.
{product_name} was not removed wishlist. Please refresh page and try again.

enable_wishlist.label: Enable wishlist
enable_wishlist.description: If disabled, addonify wishlist plugin functionality will not be functional.

wishlist_page.label: Wishlist Page
wishlist_page.description: Select a page to display wishlist table.

require_login.label: Require Login
require_login.description: A user is required to be logged-in inorder to add products in the wishlist.

if_not_login_action.label: If not login action
if_not_login_action.description: If user is required to be logged-in, choose what to do if the user tries to add product into the wishlist..

after_add_to_wishlist_action.label: After Add to Wishlist Action
after_add_to_wishlist_action.description: Choose what to do after a product is successfully added to the wishlist.

remove_from_wishlist_if_added_to_cart.label: Remove Product From Wishlist
remove_from_wishlist_if_added_to_cart.description: Remove the product from wishlist if the product is successfully added to cart.

ajaxify_remove_from_wishlist_button.label: Ajaxify Remove from Wishlist Action
ajaxify_remove_from_wishlist_button.description: Remove the product from wishlist with ajax call.

custom_css.label: Custom CSS
custom_css.description: If required, add your custom CSS code here.

undo_action_prelabel_text.label: Text Before Undo Action Label
undo_action_prelabel_text.description: Text displayed before undo action label. The placeholder, '{product_name}', when used,  is replaced by Product Name.

undo_notice_timeout.label: Undo Notice Timeout (in seconds)
undo_notice_timeout.description: Set the time till when the undo notice is to displayed.

popup_close_btn_text.label: Close Button Label
popup_close_btn_text.description: Label for button to close the popup modal box.

view_wishlist_btn_text.label: View Wishlist Button Link Label
view_wishlist_btn_text.description: Label for button to link to wishlist page inside the popup modal box.

product_added_to_wishlist_text.label: Product Added to Wishlist Text
product_added_to_wishlist_text.description: {product_name} placeholder will be replaced with the actual product name.

product_already_in_wishlist_text.label: Product Already in Wishlist Text
product_already_in_wishlist_text.description: {product_name} placeholder will be replaced with the actual product name.

could_not_add_to_wishlist_error_descript.label: Product Could not be Added to Wishlist Text
could_not_add_to_wishlist_error_descript.description: {product_name} placeholder will be replaced with the actual product name.
could_not_add_to_wishlist_error_descript.value:
Something went wrong.
{product_name} was not added to wishlist. Please refresh page and try again.

could_not_remove_from_wishlist_error_des.label: Product Could not be Removed from Wishlist Text
could_not_remove_from_wishlist_error_des.description: {product_name} placeholder will be replaced with the actual product name.
could_not_remove_from_wishlist_error_des.value:
Something went wrong.
{product_name} was not removed wishlist. Please refresh page and try again.

login_required_message.label: Login Required Description
login_required_message.description: Message displayed in modal when login is required.
login_required_message.value: Please login before adding item to Wishlist

login_btn_label.label: Login Button Label
login_btn_label.description: Label for button to redirect to login page.

btn_position.label: Button Position
btn_position.description: Choose where to place the Add to Wishlist button.

btn_position_on_single.label: Button Position on Product Single Page
btn_position_on_single.description: Choose where to place the Add to Wishlist button.

remove_already_added_product_from_wishli.label: Remove Added Product from Wishlist on Click
remove_already_added_product_from_wishli.description: If Add to Wishlist button is clicked when the product is already in wishlist, remove the product from wishlist.

btn_custom_class.label: Custom CSS Class
btn_custom_class.description: Add custom CSS class(es) to Add to Wishlist button. Separate CSS classes with spaces.

btn_label.label: Button Label
btn_label.description: Label for Add to Wishlist button.

btn_label_when_added_to_wishlist.label: Added to Wishlist Button Label
btn_label_when_added_to_wishlist.description: Set the label for Add to Wishlist button, if a product is added to the wishlist.

btn_label_if_added_to_wishlist.label: Already in Wishlist Button Label
btn_label_if_added_to_wishlist.description: Set the label for Add to Wishlist button, if a product is already in the wishlist.

show_icon.label: Show Icon in Button
show_icon.description: Display heart icon on Add to Wishlist button label.

icon_position.label: Button Icon Position
icon_position.description: Choose where to place the Add to Wishlist button Icon.

show_empty_wishlist_navigation_link.label: Display Link
show_empty_wishlist_navigation_link.description: Display a link when wishlist is empty.

empty_wishlist_navigation_link.label: Link to Page
empty_wishlist_navigation_link.description: Page to be linked in the link when wishlist is empty.

show_sidebar.label: Show Sidebar
show_sidebar.description: Sidebar off-canvas modal will be enabled to display wishlist items.

sidebar_position.label: Sidebar Position
sidebar_position.description: Choose position of the sidebar to be displayed.

sidebar_title.label: Sidebar Title
sidebar_title.description: Set the title of the wishlist to be displayed inside the sidebar.

view_wishlist_page_button_label.label: View Wishlist Page Button Label
view_wishlist_page_button_label.description: Set the button label of link to wishlist page.

sidebar_btn_position_offset.label: Sidebar Toggle Button Position Offset
sidebar_btn_position_offset.description: Set left or right position distance offset value.

sidebar_show_icon.label: Show Icon in Sidebar Toggle Button
sidebar_show_icon.description: Enable to display an icon with the label in sidebar toggle button.

sidebar_btn_icon.label: Select Icon
sidebar_btn_icon.description: Select icon to be displayed in the sidebar toggle button.

sidebar_modal_product_add_to_cart_label_.label: Add to Cart Button Label Color
Add to Cart Button On Hover Label Color

sidebar_modal_product_add_to_cart_bg_col.label: Add to Cart Button Background Color
Add to Cart Button On Hover Background Color

reset-options.label: Reset Options
reset-options.confirmText: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
reset-options.description: All the settings will be set to default.

export-options.label: Export Options
export-options.description: Backup all settings that can be imported in future.

import-options.label: Import Options
import-options.caption: Drop a file here or click here to upload.
import-options.description: Drag or upload the .json file that you had exported.
